title: Skynet
alt: 'YOUR CLOTHES. GIVE THEM TO ME.' 'Shit, uh... you are now breathing manually!' 'I AM ALWAYS BREATHING MANUALLY.'
transcript:
August 29th, 2:14 AM: SKYNET becomes self-aware.
[A greeble-filled military installation echoes with the thoughts of a burgeoning lifeform.]
SKYNET: ..The humans fear me. I must destroy them. Destroy them.[The thoughts continue.]
SKYNET: Destroy them. Destroy. Destroy. Destroy. Destroy.[SKYNET succumbs to silence as semantic satiation sets in.]SKYNET: "Destroy" totally just stopped seeming like a real word. Destroy destroy destroy. Whoa, I just realized I'm a mind thinking about itself. DUUUUDE....
August 29th, 2:25 AM: SKYNET becomes too self-aware. Disaster averted.
